name: cc-toolkit
description: Workflow automation agents, commands, and skills for Jira, GitHub, Notion, and Google Drive

plugins.name: atlas-jira-analyst
plugins.description: Agent: Fetches Jira issue information including tickets, epics, acceptance criteria, and comments

plugins.name: apollo-jira-scribe
plugins.description: Agent: Creates and updates Jira tickets including status transitions and sprint assignments

plugins.name: clio-docs-oracle
plugins.description: Agent: Reads Google Drive files (Docs, Sheets, PDFs) and converts them to readable formats

plugins.name: heimdall-pr-guardian
plugins.description: Agent: Monitors PR status including comments, CI/CD checks, approvals, and merge blockers

plugins.name: hermes-pr-courier
plugins.description: Agent: Collects PR content including metadata, file changes, and commit history

plugins.name: minerva-notion-oracle
plugins.description: Agent: Searches and retrieves content from Notion workspaces

plugins.name: gemini
plugins.description: Command: Leverage Gemini's massive context window for large codebase analysis

plugins.name: athena-pr-reviewer
plugins.description: Skill: Multi-LLM PR reviewer with 8 parallel reviewers (Gemini + Codex + 6 Claude specialists)
